Title: Kobolds of Qud
Description:
v0.3.6

This version adds kobolds into the game.  They may or may not spawn yet, but they're there.  

You can also play as 4 kobold scale colors with respective element resistance across 3 different kobold archetypes:

- The Warscale, who gains standard hp and is well-equipped for combat
- The Tinkerclaw, who is well-versed in tinkering, and while they cannot use cybernetics stations, they do get to start with one cybernetic
- The Watertail, who is well-equipped to be a merchant, gaining extra equipment load on top of their base strength.

- Programming + Design by Ames
- Additional writing by Mabel
- Art by Plugs

Github link here: https://github.com/koboldunderlord/KoboldsOfQud
